name: Avoid Me
description:
This is my first project that i have decided to publish so any type of comments or support will be a great motivation form.

Controls:- Vertical arrow keys (or) W/S keys

This game was inspired by waffles fate by Blakthornprod(might be a clone). Maybe if I get some time and support I may add more stuff like powerup's, but for now please play the game and make sure to leave a review.
